Description:
Thanks to your help, Whitebeard becomes the next Pirate King and offers his assistance in reaching the deeps.

(Whitebeard): “I have no interest in the fortune. What matters to me are the ties I’ve nurtured with my crew, who are now my family.”

He also reveals that the last piece is real and he knows how to open it. As a gesture of gratitude, he teaches you the method, ensuring you can proceed with your journey.
